TID_SWF_SETTINGS_BACKWARD_COMPATIBILITY_: Disables some features, but allows final file to work in older versions of games
TID_SWF_SETTINGS_EXPORT_TO_EXTERNAL_TIP:
Saves all symbols from current project to another .sc file. 
If external file already has linkage names from the project, they will be replaced with the version from the current project.
TID_SWF_REPACK_ATLAS_TIP: Optimizes the atlas by completely repacking it and removing duplicate sprites. Can take quite a long time for large files.
TID_SWF2_LOW_PRECISION_MATRICES_TIP: Writes transformation matrices in a smaller decimal type, which reduces file size and memory load but reduces available range for transformation.
TID_SWF_SETTINGS_TEXTURE_ENCODING_TIP:
Raw - Stores textures in an uncompressed data stream.
KTX - Compresses texture data into a Khronos Texture. The compression process can be quite long.
TID_SWF_SETTINGS_SCALE_FACTOR_TIP: Multiplies texture resolution in file by specified number
TID_SWF_SETTINGS_HAS_EXTERNAL_TEXTURE_FI: Saves each texture to .ktx or .sctx file
TID_SWF_SETTINGS_HAS_LOWRES_TEXTURES_TIP: Saves texture with lower quality for weak devices
